segments.text: Next to the boy, a little girl is standing on the floor, watching intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her arm raised, palm open, obviously anticipating her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a clear sense of cooperation in this secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her face shows pure expectation, almost a little thrill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but she's definitely a part of this plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's rather charming to see their teamwork for a forbidden snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she looks up at him, so trusting and eager, is sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are both completely engrossed in their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink remains totally unaware of their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood moment of forbidden joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to get their cookies without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little conspiracy adds a layer of fun to the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an innocent display of sibling collaboration.
segments.speaker: PAR
